greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Greatest k such that 4^k divides n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} x^(4^k)/(1 - x^(4^k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jan 28 2017
example: Since 4^2 divides 32 and 4^3 does not, we have a(32) = 2. Likewise, since no positive power of 4 divides 9, a(9) = 0.
results.author: _Tom Edgar_, Jan 03 2014
